ygData.subject: Re: Why can't I start heritrix?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Chuan, I had the same issue, the dots did not stop showing up. I could not resolve it using 1.14.x but using 2.0.2 helped. Just input ./bin/heritrix -a

Hi Chuan,

I had the same issue, the dots did not stop showing up. I could =
not resolve it using 1.14.x but
using 2.0.2 helped. Just input
./bin/heritr=
ix -a admin
while in the root directory of heritrix.
Then go to localhost:8=
080 using your browser.

best regards
farbgeist


--- In archive-crawler@ya=
hoogroups.com, "shichuanwuhan@..." <shichuanwuhan@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
>=
 
>    I follow user manual and try to start heritrix-1.14.3 on ubuntu 8.04=
. But the terminal outputs: "starting heritrix......" . I wait a long time =
but it doesn't output 
> following as user manual says. I have installed jd=
k and have set HERITRIX_HOME.
> 
> Usage: heritrix --help
>   Usage: heritr=
ix --nowui ORDER.XML
>   Usage: heritrix [--port=3D#] [--run] [--bind=3DIP,=
IP...] --admin=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD \
>       [ORDER.XML]
>   Usage: heritrix [=
--port=3D#] --selftes
> 
> 
> Who can tell me the reason? Thanks.
> 
> Chua=
n
